extension_description.message: Turn off Amazon browsing history in Chrome.

existing_session_found.description: Indicates that an existing Amazon session was found.

new_session_found.description: Indicates that a new Amazon session was found.

no_session_found.description: Indicates that an Amazon session was not found.

checking_for_initial_session.message: Checking for a current Amazon session...
checking_for_initial_session.description: Indicates that Shop Incognito is looking for an initial session.

cookie_retrieval_error.message: Could not find a current Amazon session.
cookie_retrieval_error.description: Indicates that a current Amazon session could not be discovered.

cookie_monitoring_enabled.message: Shop Incognito will monitor changes to your Amazon cookies and disable browsing history when an Amazon session starts.
cookie_monitoring_enabled.description: Indicates that Shop Incognito will disable browsing history for any future Amazon sessions.

disabling_browsing_history.description: Indicates that browsing history is being actively disabled.

disable_browsing_success.description: Indicates that browsing history was successfully disabled.

disable_browsing_error.message: Failed to disable Amazon browsing history.
disable_browsing_error.description: Indicates that an error occurred while disabling browsing history.
